items.content_html: Java rapid development platform, based (Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Apache Shiro, MyBatis, Beetl, Bootstrap, AdminLTE), online code generation, including modules: Organization, role users, menu and button authorization, data permissions, system parameters, content management, workflow, etc. Loose coupling design is adopted; one key skin switch; account security Settings, password policies; Online scheduled task configuration; Support cluster, support SAAS; Support for multiple data sources
items.title: thinkgem/jeesite4: Java rapid development platform, based (Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Apache Shiro, MyBatis, Beetl, Bootstrap, AdminLTE), online code generation, including modules:  Organization, role users, menu and button authorization, data permissions, system parameters, content management, workflow, etc.  Loose coupling design is adopted; one key skin switch;  account security Settings, password policies;  Online scheduled task configuration;  Support cluster, support SAAS;  Support for multiple data sources
